name: GattoMagico
description:
GattoMagico is my Ludum Dare 35 compo entry. It's been made in less than 48 hours. Everything has been created from scratch by me.

And now let's get to the game! :)

You are a stray cat with super-powers!!

A horde of rats is chasing you and you must make your way through different levels and reach the end.

You can shapeshift between three different shapes:

- the fat ROUND cat, whose super power is being extremely goot at eating snacks!

- the SQUARE cat, able to shoot fishes at doors to bash them open

- the TRIANGLE cat, the fastest and fiercest of them all. He can freeze the rats tailing you!

How to play:

==========

LEFT / RIGHT to move your cat

Z or A to shapeshift

X or S to use the special ability of your current form

ROUND = can eat snacks for energy

TRIANGLE = can freeze enemies

SQUARE = can fire to open doors

Press SPACE to make your choices in the menu screens.
